thread.title: Following their faith, Sikhs opened their temple doors to Oroville Dam evacuees — and strangers came pouring in
thread.title_full: Following their faith, Sikhs opened their temple doors to Oroville Dam evacuees — and strangers came pouring in

author: Jaweed Kaleem
title: Following their faith, Sikhs opened their temple doors to Oroville Dam evacuees — and strangers came pouring in
text:
Live updates >> Caption Helping refugees in the buckle of the Bible Belt 
An evangelical pastor loses some Republican members of his flock when his Fort Worth church bucks President Trump and welcomes refugees. (Gary Coronado   
An evangelical pastor loses some Republican members of his flock when his Fort Worth church bucks President Trump and welcomes refugees. (Gary Coronado   
Jaweed Kaleem is The Times' national race and justice correspondent. Follow him on Twitter , Facebook and Instagram .
